thread.title: Flights to Greece cancelled as strike announced
thread.title_full: Flights to Greece cancelled as strike announced

title: Flights to Greece cancelled as strike announced
text:
Save 
Air traffic controllers in Greece are under-taking strike action today, the UK Foreign Office has warned. 
In a statement the FCO said air traffic controllers across the country had announced a four-hour work stoppage on August 5 from 2pm – 6pm local time. 
The FCO also warned that further air traffic control strike action was also possible on August 14 and 15. 
Customers affected have been urged to contact their airline, agent, or tour operator. 
All airlines flying to and from Greece will be affected. 
EasyJet said it had been forced to cancel some flights, and added that it was “working on alternative plans to attempt to move as many affected customers as possible”.
